Class Questions

java.lang.Object
application.Questions
public class Questions extends Object
The Questions class handles the storage, retrieval, and modification of question data in both the database and local memory.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description

    Constructs a Questions manager instance.

    • Questions

      public Questions(Connection connection)
      Constructs a Questions manager instance.
      Parameters:
      connection - The active database connection.

  • Method Details

    • createTable

      public void createTable() throws SQLException
      Creates the questions table in the database if it doesn't already exist.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs.

    • loadAllFromDB

      public void loadAllFromDB() throws SQLException
      Loads all questions from the database into the local ObservableList.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • createQuestion

      public void createQuestion(String text, String author, String title)
      Creates a new question, adds it to the database and to the in-memory list.
      Parameters:
      text - The content of the question.
      author - The author of the question.
      title - The title of the question.

    • updateQuestion

      public void updateQuestion(Question q, String newText)
      Updates the content of a question in the database and memory.
      Parameters:
      q - The question to update.
      newText - The new text to be stored.

    • updateStaffNote

      public void updateStaffNote(Question q, String note)
      Updates the internal staff note for a specific question.
      Parameters:
      q - The question to update.
      note - The note to be saved.

    • markQuestionAsResolved

      public void markQuestionAsResolved(Question q)
      Marks a question as resolved in both memory and database.
      Parameters:
      q - The question to mark as resolved.

    • deleteQuestion

      public void deleteQuestion(Question q)
      Deletes a question from the database and removes it from memory.
      Parameters:
      q - The question to delete.

    • getAllQuestions

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<Question> getAllQuestions()
      Returns all currently loaded questions.
      Returns:
      An ObservableList of all questions.

    • getUnansweredQuestions

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<Question> getUnansweredQuestions()
      Returns all questions that have no associated answers.
      Returns:
      A filtered list of unanswered questions.

    • search

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<Question> search(String text) throws SQLException
      Searches for questions containing the given text.
      Parameters:
      text - The search keyword.
      Returns:
      An ObservableList of questions that match the search.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs.

      number of questions
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs
